faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Learn more about our products and services.

items.title: What is TikTok Comment Generator?
items.description: It's a free AI-powered tool that generates viral, engaging comments for TikTok videos. With 10M+ comments generated for 500K+ users, it supports 50+ languages and various comment styles.

items.title: How do I use the TikTok Comment Generator?
items.description: Simply enter the video context, choose your preferred tone (funny, supportive, trendy), and click generate. You can customize and download comments as images with TikTok-style backgrounds.

items.title: What is Mahavatar Narsimha?
items.description: It's an epic animated mythological film - the first chapter of the Mahavatar Cinematic Universe. With an IMDb rating of 9.4/10, it's India's highest-grossing animated film.

items.title: Where can I watch Mahavatar Narsimha?
items.description: The film is currently in theaters across India in 5 languages. OTT release is expected on September 25, 2025, on major platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Disney+ Hotstar.

items.title: Is TikTok Comment Generator really free?
items.description: Yes! It's 100% free to use with no sign-up required. Generate unlimited comments instantly without any cost or registration.

items.title: What's next for Seek Origin?
items.description: We're expanding both products - more features for TikTok Comment Generator and the next film in the Mahavatar Cinematic Universe, with 6 more films planned through 2037.
